======Respawns dead marine/marines======
= Description =

Dead marine/marines can be respawned in game for fun.

asw_respawn_marine is exclusively used for admin, also lobby leader is allowed to use the command if [[asw_respawn_marine_enable.wiki|asw_respawn_marine_enable]] is enabled

This command can run on console or developer console and chat command '/asw_respawn_marine' as well.


== Usage ==
Console command:
* asw_respawn_marine < marineshortname >

Chat command:

*/asw_respawn_marine < marineshortname >

for example:

* 'asw_respawn_marine sarge' to respawn dead marine sarge

* 'asw_respawn_marine ' to respawn all dead marines
